programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their “creature awareness” message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Moving to an exotic new home, an adventurous teenager meets a new group of kids and discovers a dragon in the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS
programme.desc: Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own – Wu and Wei.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tina’s new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits’ attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: With his identity as a fugitive businessman exposed, Boss Baby has been hiding out in the lawless land of Canada. But he’s forced back into action over a new crisis with Baby Love: several criminals have copycatted Boss’s fugitive strategy, somehow turning themselves into babies to hide out from the law. While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil’s perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year – and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match. Will Yi be able to create magic and connect with the troubled creature without Everest’s magic strings on her violin?

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: On an island that will make the perfect outpost, the Dragon Riders discover its indigenous residents are a mysterious new breed of dragon.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders of Berk

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil

programme.title: 10 Fight 10 Season 3
programme.desc: The show brings Thai superstars, singers, boxers, models and rappers into the celebrity boxing ring. Season 2 features a first ever Thai female match and Season 3 has two Olympics gold medalists competing for the championship. This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kong’s Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: The Grey Men 2
programme.desc: Triad boss Song seeks to whitewash his image and seize Laika’s mayoral seat amid the regime change. Despite colluding with officials, he faces a funding shortfall. To bolster his power, Song’s right-hand man and enforcer resort to violent crimes. Just as Song believes success is within reach, the dynamics among the three take an unexpected turn…

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join award-winning Malaysian actress Siti Saleha and her husband as they explore the city by day and venture into the night, discovering its vibrant culture and hidden treasures.

programme.title: Mission Impossible S4 E21 - Lover's Knot
programme.desc: Smart, stylish and suspenseful, MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE returns for its dynamic 4th season, captivating audiences with its glimpse into the world of international espionage.

programme.title: CSI S5 E21 - Commited
programme.desc: Some provocative episodes from Season 5 of CSI involve Russian mail order brides ("Nesting Dolls"), infantism ("King Baby"), and the Mexican lifestyle of narcocorrido ("Snakes"). From the creative storytelling ("4x4") to the macabre ("Who Shot Sherlock?"), there’s something in Season 5 for everyone. The CSI team investigates many crimes that hit close to home as well. Grissom comes under fire from Ecklie ("Mea Culpa"), Brass tracks down his estranged daughter ("Hollywood Brass"), and during the course of the season Greg Sanders completes his transition from the lab to the field. Last, but not least, Season 5 wraps with an amazing two-part episode ("Grave Danger"), written and directed by Quentin Tarantino, where Nick comes face to face with death while the team exhausts all its resources to same him.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S10 E02 - Confession
programme.desc: The Special Victims Unit, a specially trained squad of dedicated detectives in the NYPD, who investigate these vicious felonies. These are their stories.

programme.desc: Always up for an outrageous gamble, Uzi and Schlomi throw down the gauntlet in the biggest auction yet. They win two amazing classic cars, but will a hidden surprise in the back of another container propel one of their rivals to an even bigger payday?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 3
programme.desc: Jesse knows you don't strike it rich if you play it safe, so he gambles big on a risky bin. Then, Lori defies her husband Brandon and buys a questionable unit. Will her bold move lead to a dynasty or divorce? And later, lightning erupts when the buyers battle it out for a puzzle of parts they hope will add up to one smooth ride.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 4
programme.desc: Big money brings out fierce competition at a rare high-stakes RV auction. Then, the contents of a locker spill out at our bidders' feet, smashing several dangerous objects. Will it bring seven years of bad luck, or a 7-figure payday? And later, Jesse's experience with antiques makes him think treasures lie behind the iron curtain.

programme.title: The Closer S7 12
programme.desc: In the 100th episode, the holiday cheer is interrupted when Santa's entrance into a Christmas Village via a zip line goes horribly wrong. FRED WILLARD guest stars.

programme.title: Arrow S2 13
programme.desc: Arrow offers to train Roy so he can learn to control his newfound super-strength. But, Roy refuses to listen unless Arrow reveals his true identity, which Oliver refuses to do.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 5
programme.desc: Feel the endorphin rush as 20 of the World's Dumbest Thrillseekers do their thing. We've got a motorcycle crash, an out of control skydiver, even an angry bison. And one thing ties them all together - outrageous fails. With hair-raising commentary from our cast of comedians, including Michael O'Gorman, Jared Logan and Judy Gold

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 5
programme.desc: A deadly bin puts all the buyers on edge. It's a bad omen that casts a dark shadow over the day. As the day winds to a fever pitch, Brandon and Lori square off against Scott and Chrissy in a do or die bidding war that sends all strategy out the window. And later, our competitors uncover a high-tech find they think could worth thousands. But all that glitters may not be gold.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 6
programme.desc: Cash flies over a locker that reveals a high-ticket mystery item. Then, everyone digs deep to win an ATM, but when the dust settles will this thing be filled with big bucks or major regret? And later, the unlikeliest of duos team up with a strategy that leaves our buyers' heads spinning.

programme.title: France 24
programme.desc: France 24, the international news channel, broadcasts 24/7 to 325 million homes around the world in French, Arabic and English. The three channels have a combined weekly viewership of 50.9 million viewers (measured in 65 of the 180 countries where the channel is broadcast). From its newsroom in Paris, France 24 gives a French perspective on global affairs through a network of 160 correspondent bureaus located in nearly every country. It is available via cable, satellite, DTT, ADSL, on mobile phones, tablets and connected TVs, as well as on YouTube in three languages. Every month, France 24’s digital platforms attract 16.5 million visits, 36.5 million video views (2016 average) and 31.1 million followers on Facebook and Twitter (January 2017). france24.com

programme.desc: France 24, the international news channel, broadcasts 24/7 to 325 million homes around the world in French, Arabic and English. The three channels have a combined weekly viewership of 50.9 million viewers (measured in 65 of the 180 countries where the channel is broadcast). From its newsroom in Paris, France 24 gives a French perspective on global affairs through a network of 160 correspondent bureaus located in nearly every country. It is available via cable, satellite, DTT, ADSL, on mobile phones, tablets and connected TVs, as well as on YouTube in three languages. Every month, France 24’s digital platforms attract 16.5 million visits, 36.5 million video views (2016 average) and 31.1 million followers on Facebook and Twitter (January 2017). france24.com

programme.title: ABC National News - Episode 260
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the day's top stories and latest news, with more reporters to tell you what's going on and why it matters. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 147
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus analysis from 7.30's Political Editor Jacob Greber.

programme.title: Back Roads - Rabaul, Papua New Guinea
programme.desc: For the first time, Back Roads leaves Australian shores and travels to our closest northern neighbour, Papua New Guinea. Guest presenter Tania Bale introduces us to Rabaul, a community with close ties to Australia.

programme.title: The World - Episode 147
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: Four Corners - Episode 33
programme.desc: Four Corners is the home of Australian investigative journalism. These fearless and forensic documentaries expose scandals, trigger inquiries, fire debate and confront taboos.

programme.title: Media Watch - Episode 32
programme.desc: Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment. Host Linton Besser, a four-time Walkley award-winning investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent, brings you a fearless critique of the week's journalism.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 186
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. We've got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Michael Tetlow.

programme.title: If You're Listening - Episode 29
programme.desc: Ever watch the news and think "wow that's unprecedented". Well turns out that's not always quite true. Matt Bevan examines how what's happening now has probably happened before, to figure out what we can learn from history.

programme.title: ABC Late News - Episode 186
programme.desc: Follow the latest on today's news, covering what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Michael Tetlow in Perth.

programme.title: The Business - Episode 135
programme.desc: Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: 7.30 - Episode 147
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus analysis from 7.30's Political Editor Jacob Greber.

programme.title: The World - Episode 147
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show - PNG Independence 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Sam Wykes and Michael Chow are in Port Moresby to mark Papua New Guinea's 50 years of independence. Celebrate PNG's rich history of culture, resilience and sporting excellence with stories and achievements of athletes.

programme.title: Back Roads - Rabaul, Papua New Guinea
programme.desc: For the first time, Back Roads leaves Australian shores and travels to our closest northern neighbour, Papua New Guinea. Guest presenter Tania Bale introduces us to Rabaul, a community with close ties to Australia.

programme.title: Four Corners - Episode 33
programme.desc: Four Corners is the home of Australian investigative journalism. These fearless and forensic documentaries expose scandals, trigger inquiries, fire debate and confront taboos.

programme.title: Media Watch - Episode 32
programme.desc: Australia's leading forum for media analysis and comment. Host Linton Besser, a four-time Walkley award-winning investigative reporter and former foreign correspondent, brings you a fearless critique of the week's journalism.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 30
programme.desc: A special on the future of rural towns and cities - why are some regional populations growing while others are declining?

programme.title: The World - Episode 147
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Girish Sawlani presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: News Breakfast - Episode 187
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 187
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Lorna Dunkley.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 187
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: A Bite To Eat With Alice - Kathy Lette
programme.desc: Alice makes a dish inspired by a retro Aussie snack made famous by her guest, celebrated author and Aussie ex-pat, Kathy Lette. Kathy teaches Alice how to throw an extravagant dinner party as they cook a seafood dish.

programme.title: Australia In Colour - Crime and Punishment
programme.desc: Modern Australia is founded on the back of British convicts; crime and punishment, murder and mayhem, is part of its DNA.

programme.title: Voices of Independence - Brigadier General Ted Diro
programme.desc: Brigadier General, Ted Diro was the Commander of the Papua New Guinea Defence Force for 6 years. He was the first in the country to hold the title.

programme.title: Voices of Independence - Dame Meg Taylor
programme.desc: In the formative years of a nation and her professional life, Dame Meg Taylor worked as the Private Secretary to Chief Minister Michael Somare.

programme.title: Ambulance Australia - Episode 1
programme.desc: Exclusive access is granted within the greater Brisbane area to the Queensland Ambulance Services, following emergencies from the heart of the operations centre to the critical decisions of paramedics on the front line.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Path - Damien and Linda Brennan
programme.desc: We meet Linda and Damien Brennan, a creative couple cultivating their relationship through their garden.

programme.title: Landline - Episode 30
programme.desc: A special on the future of rural towns and cities - why are some regional populations growing while others are declining?

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 169
programme.desc: In our fast-moving world, we unpack the latest in politics, shifting national affairs and the global events shaping our lives. Guest host Melissa Clarke asks the tough questions on the big issues to the key decision makers.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien - Episode 169
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: A Bite To Eat With Alice - Kathy Lette
programme.desc: Alice makes a dish inspired by a retro Aussie snack made famous by her guest, celebrated author and Aussie ex-pat, Kathy Lette. Kathy teaches Alice how to throw an extravagant dinner party as they cook a seafood dish.

programme.title: The Pacific - PNG 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A special episode of The Pacific celebrating the 50th anniversary of PNG's independence. Join us as we reflect on 50 years of nationhood - the successes, and the challenges - plus what comes next for PNG in the years ahead.

programme.title: The Ice Cream Truck
programme.desc: Mary moves back to her suburban hometown as her husband is relocated there for work. While waiting for her husband in their new house, Mary becomes the target of an evil slasher that stalks the suburbs in an ice-cream truck. She soon learns that the suburbs are not what they seem...

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.title: Evie
programme.desc: When young Evie discovers a cursed necklace washed up on the beach, she is unaware of the malevolent force tied to it. As the necklace's dark power begins to grip her, she inadvertently awakens a deadly water demon intent on claiming her and everyone she holds dear.

programme.title: Zombie Island
programme.desc: Jeff, a big fan of zombies, goes to a deserted and mysterious island with his friends hoping to seek out exciting adventures. What started as an adventure turns out to be a horrifying journey as they get trapped on the island and are attacked by the zombies! Their lives are in danger when they fail to fight back, and the game has only just begun!

programme.title: The Case of Disappearances
programme.desc: In Misty Village, the adopted son Wen Jie is haunted by a recurring nightmare. He delves into a series of disappearance cases in the village to seek his true identity. As more villagers die mysteriously, belief in the curse of Emperor Jing Lung intensifies. Wen Jie teams up with the security chief to unveil the conspiracy and protect the villagers.

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A group of friends goes on a camping trip inside a supposedly haunted forest despite warning not to do so. As night falls and camps are set, the complicated relationships of lust and love between them are exposed, triggering a series of paranormal events that punishes them. When dawn breaks, who will get out of the forest alive?

programme.desc: Angels of destiny work as security guards, matching people with their soul mates and making sure they end up together. But what if a female guard falls in love with a man under her watch?

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 97

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 17

programme.title: From the Beautiful Country ep 2
